title: Gaming in Cardano For Mass Adoption
description: 現在、ブロックチェーンのユースケースが受け入れられつつありますが、ゲームはブロックチェーンの有望なユースケースの一つです。

f6_assessments.q0: There is no plan for anything to actually be delivered.
f6_assessments.q1: Please present an actual plan to deliver a solution with timelines and proof you have the experience to do so.
f6_assessments.q2: As there are not deliverables mentioned, the is no way to audit progress or success of this proposal.

f6_assessments.q0: Its hard to depict the challenge. Is it that the cardano platform needs more use cases and gaming can bring positive use cases to the table? If so, how? There should be a clear explanation as to what challenge this project is trying to accomplish. We should be able to view a short layout of project progression. How will this project see challenge success? How will gaming be input into the block chain and what can it bring for cardanos growth? All of these should be clear in the project.
f6_assessments.q1: Experince is <1. There is no plan as to how or where this project is going. The idea is great however, without a plan there is no way to track the projects progression or sucess. Examples as to how gaming will be used in the blockchain and how it will benifit the blockchain is a must for a project to be considered.
f6_assessments.q2: Very little information is given to audit the progress of this project. No website or project platform available. The idea is good but without a roadmap or quarterly plan there is no guarentee.

f6_assessments.q0: The proposal just mentioned the general idea without providing any solution or practical steps in order to implement it.
f6_assessments.q1: Unfortunately no plans have been given in the proposal and the proposer  didn't provide any references(e.g GitHub link) to his previous works/experiences.
f6_assessments.q2: No information is provided to audit the progress of the proposal.

f6_assessments.q0: Gaming is really very hot stuff on blockchain but coming up with new solution to existing problem of gaming on blockchain would great. Proposal can be made better if it address one of those problem like NEED OF SPEED IN GAMING WHICH LACKS IN ETHEREUM AND BITCOIN and CARDANO COULD BE BETTER SOLUTION FOR THIS.
f6_assessments.q1: Team has 1 year of experience and it would be better if team can add few details of previous project or should launch demo to showcase his idea.
f6_assessments.q2: The proposal could be made better by adding more details in each section like describing the problem , solution for the problem , road map to final product and fund management of 20k.

solution: カルダノは、ゲーミングプラットフォームの採用に道を開き、そのエコシステムの中で多くのビジネスを繁栄させることができます。
experience: 1年のブロックチェーン経験、20年以上の強力なドメイン専門知識。
